post.body: "did you see that picture of Obama without a shirt in Hawaii? Dude's smokin'!"
ringing in 2009 with cupcakes and Andrew WK. When its time to party we party hard!
Listening to mp3s of my old band. I like it more than I remember, but I'm also a way worse drummer than I remember!
tiny puppy fight! they're wearing sweaters!! They're angry!!! IT'S ADORABLE!!!!
HA! http://domonomnom.tumblr.com click the "random nom nom" button
Raving Rabbids TV Party is a damn fun game.
Seriously office-radio, who put on The Offspring? Tell me now so I can throw something at them.
waiting in the cell phone lot in case my dad missed his flight home. Didn't think the airport would be this packed, this early.
the kids section of the museum stresses me out. Lines of impatient kids and parents giving the stink-eye for moving too slow
At the Boeing museum with the family. Little kids everywhere, going nuts over all the big planes.
it is straight up disgusting outside.
wrapping the SHIT out of some presents!
The UPS guy has a damn good excuse for not making it, though. I suppose. :) Still, waiting ALL day for a knock on your door suxxors.
6am, UPS called, said I'd need to sign for a package today. Still waiting. Wish I could tweet and get results like http://tinyurl.com/59e586
good news: A bus finally stopped for me! Bad news: it's halfway broken and can only go about 10 mph.
tried to get out of ballard for 2 hours. Finally succeded, by walking.
I mashed together the twitter & flickr streams from me & @mseling's NYC trip a few weeks ago. Check it out http://tinyurl.com/9oum65
You know what's awesome? actually being sick on the day you can legitimately play hooky from work because of the weather. ugh :(
Taking a break from snow-induced hermit-ness to go get a bagel and coffee at Java Bean. Feels good to get outside.
bus quotes: "my camero is hella sexy", "fuck vicaden, pass me the mcnuggets!" & "Whatev you do, bro, don't lose that Pokemon!"
